result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kirk P. Knight

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Kirk P. Knight in court with attorney David A Geier.  Linda A. Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Geier gives status.  Believes the State will dismiss the charges/case based on the plea in 14CF306.  Court dismisses/reads in.
Plea/sentencing hearing on February 16, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Kirk P. Knight in court with attorney David A Geier.  Kevin Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Geier notes new offer provided and no trial will be necessary as this will be resolved along w/some other matters.  Court requests reset to 2/16/2015.  Bond continued.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 16, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Kirk P. Knight
Current: 1316 Hooker Ave., Unit #6, Madison, WI 53704 United States  (Effective: 12-30-2014)
Prior: 812 Vine Street, Baraboo, WI 53913
Jury trial on February 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Final pre-trial on February 9, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
Attorney Geier now assigned to the case.  Removed FPT from CCAP on 11/17 and JT on 12/3.  Branch 2 to reset.
Cover Letter from Atty. Steinman
Jury trial on December 3, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Final pre-trial on November 17, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Final pre-trial on October 20, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Jury trial on October 28, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Email confirming warrant was quashed

Defendant Kirk P. Knight in court with attorney Thomas L. Steinman.  John A. Newton appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Steinman explains prior nonappearance for arraignment.  Court quashes warrant.  Atty Steinman acknowledges receiving information, waives reading and stands mute.  Court enters Not Guilty plea- Set for Trial.  Bond continued.
Body

Attorney Thomas L. Steinman in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Steinman doesn't know why the DE didn't appear today.  Requests short reset.  Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant.
Arraignment on July 15, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Prelim. Hrg. waived, Rec'd copy of INFO/waived reading

Defendant Kirk P. Knight in court with attorney Thomas L Steinman.  Linda A Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court officer George Bonham appears.  Court finds probable cause, bind over for Br 2.  Set for arraignment.  Bond continues.  Arraignment scheduled for July 15, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on June 27, 2014 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Kirk P. Knight in court with attorney Thomas L Steinman.  Sue M Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Awaiting to give information to DA's office.  Requests preliminary hearing.  Warrant quashed.  Bond continues.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 27, 2014 at 10:30 am.
Return date on June 6, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Thomas L Steinman in court.  Sue M Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Steinman requests 1 week stay of any warrant.  State doesn't object.  Court authorizes warrant but stays it for 7 days.  Bond continued.  Return date scheduled for June 6, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
No poss. of controlled substances w/o valid prescription

Pre-trial conference on May 16, 2014 at 09:00 am.
Return date on May 28, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Kirk P. Knight appeared by video means from LEC w/atty. Tom Steinman. Prosecuting Atty Sue M Mueller appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  Advised rights to an attorney.  DE does qualify for PD representation.  State requests $2500.00 Cash bail.   Requests Preliminary hearing; Time limits waived.  $1000.00 SIGNATURE bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  No possession of controlled substances w/o valid Rx.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 16, 2014 at 09:00 am.  Return date scheduled for May 28, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
